FuncDef: This command configures the minimum threshold for decreasing the bandwidth of an LSP based on active measurement of LSP bandwidth.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the minimum difference between the current bandwidth reservation of the LSP and the (measured) maximum average data rate, expressed as a percentage of the current bandwidth, for decreasing the bandwidth of the LSP. Values-1 to 100.

Specifies the minimum difference between the current bandwidth reservation of the LSP and the (measured) maximum average data rate, expressed as an absolute bandwidth (Mb/s), for decreasing the bandwidth of the LSP. Values-0 to 100000.
